name: jtahlborn
text: **Nothing is going to replace testing it in a real system**.  you may be able to catch something blatant in a bug report or in visual inspection, but detecting changes due to more complex interactions will be impossible.  or even detecting seemingly simple changes which alter how the GC affects your running app or how hotspot optimizes your code (you _are_ checking the c++ code too, right) or how some key algorithm performs...
